data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,780 believers in Kaolack.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kaolack, Senegal
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Kaolack, Senegal to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 874,541, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kaolack, Senegal. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, I pray that the Susu people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Susu people know you.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Kaolack, Senegal.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kaolack, Senegal to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary:
the state of Kaolack, Senegal has a population of 918,400.

We estimate Kaolack has 1,780 people who might know Jesus, 42,079 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 874,541 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 515 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: There are 918,400 people living in the state of Kaolack. Only about 1,780 might be believers.
